result.title: E-books
result.content:
Most of high rated coders say that, they didn't refer to any books, instead learnt topics by "googling" and solving related problems. But anyways, it is not a bad idea to have a collection of E-books that might be beneficial.

If you know other books, comment the links and I'll add them.

  1. Mathematics for Computer Science
  2. Competitive Programming 3
